events.message: I received my order last week, but I would like to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I no longer want it.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message detailing their desire to return the product.
An agent specialized in refund cases has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund, and I am here to help you with that process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can assist you better with the return procedure?
Sure, my order number is 789456123, and I want a refund because the product did not match the description online.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund as soon as we receive the returned product. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the prompt help! I appreciate that you are sending the return label so I can get my refund quickly.
The refund process has been initiated, and you should receive confirmation once the return is processed and your money is refunded.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your order.
We are closing this case as your refund has been successfully processed. Thank you for your patience and have a great day!
We would appreciate it if you could take a moment to complete a short satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
